name: Roleship v1
description:
This is one of the games that I made for a game jam. The game is about Sarah being stranded on the Corrupted Island and Jacob (the character you control) will stay with her. He has to fight slimes and wolves in this open world. He also has to go to the tower and defeat the Corrupted Knight so he can obtain the orb and go to the portal to escape the island.

***This is a game made in just 7 days so there were a lot of features that I had to scrap off to meet the deadline. There might be bugs in the game.

KNOWN ISSUES - Animations are not complete

- There were supposed to be five towers but due to time constraints, there is only one tower and a portal

There will be updates to the games after the deadline/game jam.

HOW TO PLAY

WASD keys to move

Space to jump

Left mouse button to attack

Left shift to run
